articles.description: Dhindhore Baje Re has been crooned by Darshan Raval and Bhoomi Trivedi.
articles.content: Rocky Aur Rani Kii Prem Kahaani's fourth song Dhindhora Baje Re is finally out. Starring Alia Bhatt and Ranveer Singh, the song looks grand with peppy beats making it a festival song. Crooned by Dars… [+1805 chars]
